entry.title: Ode to a Farm Boy
entry.summary:
Author: TheBobblehat

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,416Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 1

Summary: There are three things Bruce Wayne does not do: press interviews, cheap wine, and romance. As the head of Wayne Enterprises, Bruce has spent a majority of his adult life trying to utilize his wealth to help the people of Gotham, for better or for worse. Which is why he has no time to spare for his dating life. To supplement his more physical needs, Bruce spends one night a month in his downtown penthouse with "hired help." No names, no kissing, and never the same man.On one such evening, he opens the door to who he thinks is his guest for the night. 6'2", 225lb, and the biggest blue eyes Bruce had ever seen. But when it turns out that this Clark Kent isn't a gentleman of the night, and in fact a savvy reporter come to ask about his company's financial audits, Bruce realizes that he might not be able to get rid of this one so easy.
